attributes.action: support the parents of disabled children in South Devon in their campaign to retain the John Parkes respite unit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are currently campaigning against the closure of the John Parkes respite unit in South Devon, it is an extremely valuable resource to all the families who use it providing a break from the heavy responsibilities of caring for a disabled child, knowing that their child will be cared for in an environment where all their medical, positional, social and emotional needs can be met.
